attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the past year 2 Male Swans have been killed by dogs in a local Nature reserve ( Heathlake in Wokingham Berkshire ) the 1st , when a dog jumped into the water and the Cob tried to protect its Cygnets . The Pen finally found herself another mate after being with the 1st one for at least 12 years and within 2 weeks , whilst being fed by a local woman another dog jumped into the water and injured the Cob , which became infected and died .

rejection.details: The 'title' must be a call to action for HM Government not just a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
